name: Piano Cat 2019
description:
Piano Cat 2019 is the best and most adorable piano music rhythm game.

In a variety of fantasy scenes,the adorable kitty sitting by the piano will play the latest hit songs and old favorites, including Fade, Canon, Havana, Someone Like You... and Blue Bird, Secret Base, We Are, Unravel.. and other 600+ songs.Updated hit music, all for free!
Join the cat pianist into the rhythm wave!

How to play?

Click the falling notes by following the rhythm and don't miss any one, simple as that.

Game features:

1.Simple actions. Easy to control.
2.Variety of lovely cats and fantastic backgrounds.
3.Speed up with the music and challenge yourself.
4.Tons of songs ranging from classical to top-charting hits.
5.Get ready for the beautiful music and sweet kitty in fascinating scenes.

Join the kitty cat and become a pianist. Start your exiting music journey!
